fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a *tough* station to work in...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a *tough* station to work in. You have all of Jamrock to cover -- that district should have *three* precincts, but money is what it is."

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "The badge in your hands shines as y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The badge in your hands shines as you rotate it, catching light. You see lines of information:

fields.Title: Empathy: "Still -- he doesn't trust you compl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Still -- he doesn't trust you completely.

fields.Title: You: ""Name: Harrier Du Bois...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Name: Harrier Du Bois..."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Heavy-duty case-solving machine."
fields.Dialogue Text: Heavy-duty case-solving machine.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My pleasure.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "My pleasure."

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "The man keeps winking at you with h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man keeps winking at you with his green-grey eyes. The photo is old, no doubt about that.

fields.Title: Endurance: "The pain in your chest tells you yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The pain in your chest tells you you were working yourself to death to earn that rank.

fields.Title: You: "How old?"
fields.Dialogue Text: How old?

fields.Title: Jump to: [BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "The badge in your hands shines as y..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Kinks like satellite-officers and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kinks like satellite-officers and the additional yefreitor rank I already explained."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not strange at all -- your name is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not strange at all -- your name is Harrier Du Bois. Like it says on your police badge."

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "The badge in your hands shines as y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The badge in your hands shines as you rotate it, catching light. You see lines of information on it. And a shining watermark.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Lieutenant double-yefreitor.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant double-yefreitor."

fields.Title: You: "Study the badge."
fields.Dialogue Text: Study the badge.

fields.Title: You: "And he's winking? Why?"
fields.Dialogue Text: And he's winking? Why?

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Don't be fooled. The bad times have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't be fooled. The bad times have already begun.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not putting up with anything,"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not putting up with anything," the lieutenant says with a little smile. "You put your life on the line and we came out on top. That matters."

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "This document confirms it -- Harrie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This document confirms it -- Harrier Du Bois, i.e. Harry, is really your name.

fields.Title: You: ""Serial: REV12-62-05-JAM41...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Serial: REV12-62-05-JAM41..."

fields.Title: You: "Turn back to the document."
fields.Dialogue Text: Turn back to the document.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The lack of alcohol swelling is a b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lack of alcohol swelling is a bonus. Though there's a *pinch* of that in your cheeks already.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's a wartime name. Revolutionary..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's a wartime name. Revolutionary. The kind mothers give their sons during troubled times. Like 'Undying' or 'Boxer' or 'Ironhide'."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's just the serial number. Rev..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's just the serial number. Revachol, Jamrock, Precinct 41, with some numbers thrown in there for good measure."

fields.Title: Jump to: [BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "The badge in your hands shines as y..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, apparently you've had a rathe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, apparently you've had a rather successful career in the past and," -- he pauses to examine you -- "this leads me to believe maybe your current *situation* is only temporary."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "...from bullets, hunger, shrapnel,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...from bullets, hunger, shrapnel, kidnappings, and worse.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And sometimes," he continues, "the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And sometimes," he continues, "they just prefer the type of police work available to their current rank -- in your case, lieutenant."

fields.Title: Jump to: [BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "The badge in your hands shines as y..."]
You: ""I thought my rank was *drunk*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I thought my rank was *drunk*."

fields.Title: You: ""Harrier Du Bois it is, then." (Acc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Harrier Du Bois it is, then." (Accept it.)

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "I remember that time... the tie aro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I remember that time... the tie around your neck feels tight suddenly. That was a good time. We had a good work/drink balance going. What happened, man? Pump it up.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Wake up the past and tell it to sta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wake up the past and tell it to stay awake -- the bad times are here to stay.

fields.Title: You: ""Declined?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Declined?"

fields.Title: You: ""So you've been putting up with all..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you've been putting up with all my bullshit because I'm your superior?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""More than driving your motor carri..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "More than driving your motor carriage into the sea. The upside of that is, of course, you finding your badge."

fields.Title: You: ""Rank: LTN-2JFR?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Rank: LTN-2JFR?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good," he says with a quick smile."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good," he says with a quick smile.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Dcomptage is the hierarchical sys..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Dcomptage is the hierarchical system employed by the Revachol Citizens Militia. It means counting down to twos."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Pleased to make your acquaintance,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pleased to make your acquaintance, Harrier Du Bois."

fields.Title: Logic: "But the badge is new. You used an o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But the badge is new. You used an old photo for a new badge.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Four months ago? Seems like a new..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Four months ago? Seems like a new document was recently made. One is handed to you as part of a promotion, or... if you lose the old one.

fields.Title: You: ""I found my badge!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I found my badge!"

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "That's what it says on the badge. N..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's what it says on the badge. No more information is provided.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. It's the designation of your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. It's the designation of your Precinct. Forty-one. Like mine says Fifty-seven. The 57th is mostly Industrial Harbour. A lot of asphalt. The 41st is..." He stops.

fields.Title: You: ""Thanks. That gives me hope.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thanks. That gives me hope."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A new badge usually comes with a n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A new badge usually comes with a new rank. You seem to have been... doing well then."

fields.Title: You: ""What kinks?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What kinks?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "A lot can happen in four months. Es..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A lot can happen in four months. Especially in winter. The winters are never easy on you, of that you are sure.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""People have been through worse and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "People have been through worse and gotten back on their feet, lieutenant double-yefreitor," he says with a reassuring little smile.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I... uh, don't really know how to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I... uh, don't really know how to respond to that, lieutenant double-yefreitor."

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "Why do you think? His face is alrea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why do you think? His face is already contorted by the Expression. Although it looks less grotesque on him than it does on you now.
fields.Alternate1: Why do you think? His face is already contorted by the Expression. Although it looks less grotesque on him than it did on you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The lieutenant is a rank above ser..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The lieutenant is a rank above sergeant and below captain. It's the highest rank in the RCM that still does field work. I am a lieutenant."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The countdown is modelled after the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The countdown is modelled after the dual-leadership system employed by the Left during the Revolution. Which in turn was developed by last century experimental psychologists in the University of Koenigstein.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait -- satellite-officers?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait -- satellite-officers?"

fields.Title: Logic: "The numbers are not there for 'good..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The numbers are not there for 'good measure'. They have an administrative purpose. One that's unfortunately been erased from your memory.

fields.Title: You: ""Strange. It doesn't say Raphal Am..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Strange. It doesn't say Raphal Ambrosius Costeau."

fields.Title: Jump to: [BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "The badge in your hands shines as y..."]
You: ""What's a 'dcomptage'?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's a 'dcomptage'?"

fields.Title: Authority: "The long and short of it is: you're..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The long and short of it is: you're his superior.

fields.Title: Logic: "You're pretty sure you weren't doin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're pretty sure you weren't doing *well* -- but better? Probably yes.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "He's not going to call you Harrier...."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's not going to call you Harrier. He'll keep calling you 'officer' when he's angry with you and 'detective' when he's not.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Harrier Du Bois..." He looks you u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Harrier Du Bois..." He looks you up and down. "It suits you. I'm going to call you 'Harry,' since it's short for 'Harrier'."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't want to get better -- I wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't want to get better -- I want to get worse."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why? It's a cool name. I like it."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why? It's a cool name. I like it." He shrugs. "Besides, you're Harry anyway. No one's ever called *Harrier*."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "The case created a lot of *edge* yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The case created a lot of *edge* you have to *take off*. The death march really gets us going.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "It's no wonder you are like you are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's no wonder you are like you are, he thinks. But then again...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "...Roberts, Feuerbach, De Mettrie....."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...Roberts, Feuerbach, De Mettrie... suddenly names from your dcomptage flash in your forebrain.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "No, he's not. He's going keep calli..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, he's not. He's going keep calling you "officer" when he's angry with you -- and "detective" when he's not.

fields.Title: Jump to: [BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "The badge in your hands shines as y..."]
You: "Put the badge away. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Put the badge away. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "A name like armour."
fields.Dialogue Text: A name like armour.

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "The man in the photo looks at you s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man in the photo looks at you solemnly.

fields.Title: You: ""Thanks for explaining all this." (..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Thanks for explaining all this." (Don't mention it.)

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "Encased between two durable plastic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Encased between two durable plastic sheets is a bluish card with lines of information -- and a watermark in the shape of the street grid of Revachol West.

fields.Title: You: ""Wait, what kind of name is 'Harrie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait, what kind of name is 'Harrier'?"

fields.Title: Logic: "A new document is given to you as p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A new document is given to you as part of a promotion. Or when you lose the old one.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There are many reasons one would d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There are many reasons one would do this. The rank above you in your precinct's *dcomptage* might be taken. Or sometimes promoted officers do not *want* to replace their superiors -- out of respect."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The lowest rank is junior officer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The lowest rank is junior officer -- usually teenagers. Then there are the patrol officers. Then sergeants, lieutenants, and then a captain. That's basically it, except for a few kinks."

fields.Title: You: ""Precinct: 41?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Precinct: 41?"

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "Such a small yet precious thing. Ex..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Such a small yet precious thing. Expensive paper caught between thick plastic like a fly in amber. It reads:

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Good choice. A newer photo would lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good choice. A newer photo would look... different.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But then again..." A faint smile...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But then again..." A faint smile. "It's a legendary district. And a hell of a station too. It must be an honour and a curse to work with people like Pryce, McCoy, Berdyayeva..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At least *something* good came out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At least *something* good came out of all this." The lieutenant glances at the badge in your hands.
fields.Alternate1: "At least *something* good came out of all this." The lieutenant glances at the badge in your hands, frowning slightly. "You may have lied to me before about it missing, but... yes. At least you have it now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You are given the title of 'satell..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You are given the title of 'satellite-officer' if your partner is quickly promoted through the ranks and you rise with him. You don't seem to be a satellite..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""'Harrier,' that's long for 'Harry'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'Harrier,' that's long for 'Harry'. So you *are* Harry..." He thinks. "Evrart was half right. Probably not a lot of people know your full name. Whoever told him you're Harry Du Bois didn't."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm afraid there are no ex-alcohol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid there are no ex-alcoholics."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It does seem to be a rather *speci..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It does seem to be a rather *special* relationship the two of you have forged, yes, lieutenant double-yefreitor."

fields.Title: You: ""But... I don't *want* to be Harrie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But... I don't *want* to be Harrier Du Bois." (Don't accept it.)

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "A police badge on which you see the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A police badge on which you see the photo of a man -- you. Some seaweed is stuck to the back.

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "You see: a photo, a name, a rank, a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see: a photo, a name, a rank, a document number, the date of issue, and -- in the lower right corner -- your precinct.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "It looks better on him because he i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It looks better on him because he isn't in as much *pain* while producing it as you are now. Although there's already a hint of that pain, certainly.

fields.Title: Endurance: "It's meant to keep you safe."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's meant to keep you safe.

fields.Title: You: ""What is a 'lieutenant double-yefre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What is a 'lieutenant double-yefreitor?'"

fields.Title: You: ""So you've been putting up with me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So you've been putting up with me because we're of the same rank?"

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "This is your name. You are Harrier..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is your name. You are Harrier Du Bois. Harry.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "You should look at the badge when L..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should look at the badge when Lieutenant Kitsuragi is around -- he could help you make sense of all this.

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "The number shows that this badge be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The number shows that this badge belongs to an officer of the 41st precinct.

fields.Title: You: ""I won't forsake the drink -- it ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I won't forsake the drink -- it makes me happy."

fields.Title: You: ""What?"
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "He knew all those people although t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He knew all those people although they're not from his station. They must be big.

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "Eight, maybe ten years. The guy in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Eight, maybe ten years. The guy in the picture is rather good looking. He's got a nice haircut and is distinctly lacking in massive sideburns.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It matters more than driving your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It matters more than driving your motor carriage into the sea." He smiles encouragingly. "And now we've even found your badge."

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "Revachol, Jamrock, Precinct 41. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Revachol, Jamrock, Precinct 41. You don't remember what the numbers in the middle mean.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Don't be fooled. The bad times have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't be fooled. The bad times have already begun.

fields.Title: Empathy: "He trusts you -- for now. Try not t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He trusts you -- for now. Try not to spoil it.

fields.Title: You: ""And double-yefreitor?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And double-yefreitor?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. I've been putting up with you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. I've been putting up with you because, despite an unconventional approach, you're doing good police work."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Four months ago -- I'm guessing th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Four months ago -- I'm guessing that's when you were promoted to the rank of lieutenant double-yefreitor."

fields.Title: Authority: "And you? Is it an honour to work wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And you? Is it an honour to work with you? Don't ask him, ask yourself.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The title of yefreitor is added to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The title of yefreitor is added to your rank when you decline a promotion to a higher rank -- in your case, captain," the lieutenant explains. "You have declined twice. Thus you're double-yefreitor."

fields.Title: You: "Look at the photo."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at the photo.

fields.Title: You: ""Date of issue: 7th of November, '5..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Date of issue: 7th of November, '50..."

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "It looks like you had quite the cha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It looks like you had quite the charming face -- way back then. Your hair is brown and slightly curly, your eyes seem more clear somehow.

fields.Title: BADGE: LTN-2JFR DU BOIS: "The badge was issued roughly four m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The badge was issued roughly four months ago.
